file-linereader
==============

异步按行读取文件
Asynchronous Read File Line By Line

    var lineReader = require('file-linereader');

    var flr = new lineReader.LineReadStream();
    flr.on('line', function(line) {
        console.log(line)
    })

    lineReader.eachLine('file.txt', function(line) {
        console.log(line);
    });
